item.description:
Hello Canucks,

It's been awhile since we've been to John Harvards so we'll be heading there in October for their good beer and food.

Please make sure you RSVP so we know how many people will be joining us.

Hope you can make it!

Andrew
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be standing by the bar

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Expat Canadian October Meetup
